content.description: Sit start the same as Shenanigans on the crimp rail and make the throw to the lip. Instead of mantling out, traverse right passing two, tooth-like holds that wiggle a little bit, and then to a sloper. Mantle out from here for a few feet of easy climbing to top out.
content.protection: One pad under the top out is nice. The ground is pretty soft for the start.
content.location: Start the same as for Shenanigans, but finish right.

content.description: Short and probably soft. Likely done before. Sit start with hands matched on a rail. Up to a good, sharp crimp, then to a jug and an easy topout.
content.protection: A single crashpad is fine. Maybe an attentive spotter to make sure you don't tumble down the steep hill
content.location: Dead center on the obvious face, to the right of two trees

content.description: A small fin-like boulder with a decent little climb.
